MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH7 postcode area of Mold, affecting properties in Ffordd Las and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 11PM last night. Our engineers are on site investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:27AM on 28th, November 2020.
